titles.title: To allow a period in which members of the clergy may revoke their exemption from Social Security coverage.
To allow a period in which members of the clergy may revoke their exemption from Social Security coverage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Provides for a two-year open season for members of the clergy who wish to revoke their exemption from Social Security coverage.
